actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Intellectual Property and Judicial Administration.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intellectual Property and Judicial Administration

official_title: To amend the Trademark Act of 1946 to limit infringement actions for registered marks of professional sports teams.

summary.text: Amends the Trademark Act of 1946 to preclude an action for infringement of a registered mark identifying the goods or services of a professional sports team if: (1) the action would be for infringement of the mark with respect to the team's association with the place in which it is located; (2) the team has moved to and is located in another locale more than 50 miles from the place with which it is associated; and (3) the alleged infringement occurred after the team's move.

titles.title: To amend the Trademark Act of 1946 to limit infringement actions for registered marks of professional sports teams.
